data.title: Cristian Pancorbo on LinkedIn: #coronavirus #coronavirusoutbreak #teachingonline #beready #teachers
data.meta_description: After some years of teaching Spanish online I would recommend doing the following when teaching online language classes. Just some ideas that might help someâ€¦
data.text:
We mesure our countries by their GDP and our students by their GPA. It is not working! Let's focus on making something that has better results for everyone. Something new, justice centered, anti-racist, equitable and solution focused. How does that look like in your office, school, house, ballot, plans...? #justice #leadership #education

Learning how to better help after traumatic experiences. I recommend this course as basic training on how to help people after traumatic experiences.

I'm putting some ideas down in this article about what can be done in education to deal with this crisis from the education sector perspective. It's very general, but I'll love to start conversation about how the future should look like and add voices. #education #teaching #school #covid19 #corononavirus #educationalequity
